about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the dark and exciting everyday life of private detective Jack Rain in the game "Cold Steel: Shadow Saga". The game offers a unique mix of a gripping storyline, action-packed shootouts and a rich atmosphere of neon noir style. Help Jack sort out mafia intrigues, overcome betrayals and emerge victorious from deadly situations.

Plot
Jack Rain, an experienced private detective, cooperates with the police department for combating drugs, extending a hand to justice in the shadow war against the drug mafia. One day, a mysterious girl named Elizabeth Nightfall turns to him for help, asking him to return the jewelry she stole from her. Having agreed, Jack finds himself drawn into a trap when it turns out that his client is the wife of the head of the mafia organization Victor Dupont, and a reward has been placed on his head. Now Jack must show all his skills and cunning to survive and find answers.
Key Features
Deep Plot: Uncover the truth behind the truth as you uncover the secrets and betrayals surrounding the Dupont family.
Noir Atmosphere: Walk the gloomy streets of the metropolis, be captivated by atmospheric port warehouses, luxurious mansions and abandoned factories.
Dynamic Shootouts: Feel the adrenaline in explosive action scenes where every decision and shot matters.
Challenging Puzzles: Solve riddles, crack safes and navigate through intricate locations with Jack to progress through the story.
Unpredictability: The game offers unexpected plot twists. Take into account every detail to understand who is a friend and who is an enemy.
Gameplay
Play as Jack Rain, completing various missions in a wide range of locations: from his cozy detective agency to the criminal underworld of the city. Use a variety of weapons and equipment to deal with numerous opponents. Explore the city streets, look for clues and connections to get to the truth and free Elizabeth's parents from the clutches of Victor Dupont.

Your choice of ending
Make a difficult choice in the final mission of the game: will Jack trust his friends and allies or decide to fight crime alone? It's all up to you.

content_descriptors.notes: There will be murders and drug use in the game. We do not promote this, but on the contrary, we are against such actions and want to show how it harms people.

short_description: Jack Rain is a private detective working with the police drug squad. A girl comes to him and asks for help with her inheritance. Jack agrees, and during the mission it turns out that the girl set him up. Now there is a reward for his head and all the criminals in the city, including the drug mafia.
